question_text: Which of the following best describes DOCSIS in relation to cable modems?
answer_options: A connector type used for broadband routers
A management protocol for DSL modems
A standard that governs data transmission over cable networks
A security feature built into modem firmware
correct_answer: A standard that governs data transmission over cable networks
explanation: DOCSIS (Data Over Cable Service Interface Specification) defines how cable modems transmit data over coaxial infrastructure.
